titleStmt.title: The Old mans complaint as followeth, 1680.
titleStmt.author: Farthing, William, b. 1621.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.H. for J. Clarke.

notesStmt.note: Also contains: A Friendly admonition, and Fifteen short prayers, the latter of which uses the author's name as an acrostic.
Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
